issues.message: Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
'img' is already declared in the upper scope.
Insert a <!DOCTYPE> declaration to before this <html> tag.
Define this function outside of a loop.
Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
Remove the declaration of the unused '_tpErrorHandler' variable.
Insert a <!DOCTYPE> declaration to before this <html> tag.
Rename this parameter "expectedPath" to match the regular expression ^[_a-z][a-z0-9_]*$.
Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
Remove this useless assignment to variable "replacements".
